snippet.title: ESOTERIC EBB | Demo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
ESOTERIC EBB is a single-player RPG built on boundless tabletop freedom. 

Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2057760

Unravel a political conspiracy with your goblin sidekick. Roll dice in tense encounters. Explore a city on the brink of its first ever election. Become a cleric of legends or completely ruin the campaign.
